nodes.bodyText: I'm not very familiar with the code but this does not seem to be related to the issue you describe. This controls the overall height, doesn't it? Should this be removed?

I removed this part, because it cut off a small part of the video area on the bottom side. After removing this, the video sizes were still correct. I tested different video resolutions and ratios, single and dual videos and used Firefox and Chrome. It seems to work so far.
